曾為國際知名企業設計廣告作品的韓國一流設計師全相炫，將畢生所學的廣告平面設計技巧無私地傾囊相授！ 本書匯集了45款高質感的廣告平面設計作品，內容涵蓋照片處理、創意合成、光影變幻、混合模式等諸多領域，讓您重新學習圖像、影像結合，以及Photoshop豐富多元的濾鏡功能與Illustrator平面設計繪圖技法，練就精湛嫻熟的廣告平面特效製作技能。 透過不同作品的創意發想與技術累積，讓您不僅學到最正確且快速的製作技巧，並且在工作應用上更能啟發無限的設計靈感、提高藝術品味。◎Photoshop與Illustrator的操作說明清楚明瞭，學習成效加倍。 ◎從基礎觀念到專業技法，逐步累積廣告設計的創作精髓。 ◎操作指令中英文對照，英語版本也能輕鬆對應。

This dynamic bestselling author/illustrator duo captures the ups and downs of everyday life in this chapter book offering fun and perfectly narrated short stories—for kids who can already read, like the Great One, or for kids who are learning to read, like the Pain. Friend or Fiend? is the fourth book in a quartet of hilarious and warm-hearted stories that showcase the joys, the fun, and the frustrations of sibling rivalry and devotion, as seen through the eyes of those sassy siblings, the Pain and the Great One. What's the difference between a friend and a fiend? The Pain and the Great One are about to find out!Jake is so embarrassed by a reading circle blunder, he vows never to speak in class again. Abigail believes she can no longer trust one of her best friends. And on the perfect snow day, who rescues Jake when someone jumps on him and washes his face in snow? Finally, Jake and Abigail decide to plan a birthday party to celebrate the date when their beloved cat Fluzzy first became part of their family. But only Fluzzy knows what really happened on that dark and stormy night a year ago. And he's not telling—or is he?

★介紹人物的繪畫技法訣竅一邊透過範例練習人物製作的訣竅，一邊讓插畫的各種效果呈現出高水準的繪畫技法。★透過摩登＆感性的範例來學習各種畫技透過人體繪製與照片合成，學習內含商業、摩登、感性的插畫製作過程。★透過專業設計師創意發想之過程來學習的Creative Story闡述作品的創意發想過程，設計師的創意從何處出現、如何將發想實現…等。透過專業設計師的創意發想過程，啟發各位心中的想像工房。上天造物之美，人體器官極奧妙。設計師在創作的過程中，人物常常成為創作的要素之一，而人體的繪製是需要設計者長期觀察人物的外觀、儀態所積累而成。本書闡述各種設計人員所應具備的人物觀察法、刺激靈感的練習，以及增廣視野的實務執行方法。並運用Illustrator的眾多設定與核心功能，逐步分解說明人體的描繪方式，諸如女性玲瓏有緻的曼妙身軀、跳躍的律動人形、吹彈可破的細緻膚質、水汪汪的美麗大眼、豐潤性感的美唇...等，運用豐富的圖文搭配、階段式步驟化的教學流程，引領各位一步步累積個人的創作實力，展現出令人大為驚豔的絕佳作品。除了基本的徒手繪製之外，更介紹利用既有的素材照片加工編修，將實際的素材轉化為一張張符合現代潮流趨勢的時尚設計。

From the Caldecott Honor-winning illustrator of Casey at the Bat comes a rich and exquisitely crafted edition of one of the best-known tales by the Brothers Grimm. Christopher Bing captures the light and darknessas well as the deep emotional coreof the story of an innocent girl and the wolf who would devour her, in this most magnificent and definitive version of the classic fairy tale.

Chicka chick boom boom!Will there be enough room?There is always enough room for this rolicking alphabet chant that is been a children's favorite for over 20 years!Bill Martin Jr. and John Archambault's rhythmic rhymes and Caldecott Honor illustrator Lois Ehlert's bold, cheerful art has made the Chicka Chicka series a classic! For the first time ever, the complete edition of the original Chicka Chicka Boom Boom story will be available in a new lap-sized board book that will surely delight a new generation of Chicka Chicka fans.

日本亞馬遜讀者滿分推薦，大受好評的和風圖樣素材集。本書是2009年四月出版的『和柄パーツ&パターン素材』續編，讀者們引頸期盼的第二集。友禪染行家成願義夫精選最具和風特色的花樣與底圖，本集的主題是「能夠無限連結的和風圖案」、「能夠將元素獨立擷取出來的圖案」、「依照用途設計的橫線、方格以及直線」，以Illustrator所使用的檔案格式EPS.、JPEG、PNG三種檔案格式收錄在DVD ROM中。光碟中附錄的檔案形式有：●EPS檔案　附圖層資訊保存附輸出CMYK資訊的檔案。對應Adobe Illustrator8的檔案讓您在解析圖層時相對輕鬆，方便運用。●JPG、PNG檔案　附PATH資訊保留PATH資訊的RGB，並以350dpi儲存的高精細圖檔。方便在各種簡單的印刷上使用。使用環境：●Windows／Macintosh●OS:Windows XP以上／MacOS9以上●EPS檔:Adobe Illustrator8以上●JPG檔

Combining a diverse selection of classic quotations and forty-eight poems, twelve for each of the four seasons, with the energetic and colorful paintings of a Caldecott Medal winning illustratror, this is the definitive collection of poems about the seasons for children and adults. Spring births a polliwog that becomes a "full frog"; in summer, wildflowers choreograph an extravaganza; autumn's apples are found in generations of people's pockets; and winter's snowfall makes inanimate objects more beautiful than we could ever imagine. In addition to master poets Carl Sandburg, Richard Brautigan, Joseph Bruhac, and Karla Kuskin, twnety-nine of the poems have been especially commissioned by a host of contemporary poets such as Rebecca Kai Dotlich, Joan Bransfield Graham, J. Patrick Lewis, and Marilyn Singer. The exciting, bold palette of Caldecott Medallist David Diaz brings the seasons to life and asks us to look at the seasons all over again, for the first time.

This delightful flip book by renowned author-illustrator team Laura Numeroff and Lynn Munsinger celebrates all the wonderful things brothers and sisters can do together, from climbing trees and sharing snacks to playing sports and making music. After reading what brothers do best, simply flip the book over and enjoy the story againfrom a sister's perspective! With charming mirrored text and adorable illustrations, this exciting follow-up to the best-selling What Mommies Do Best/What Daddies Do Best and What Grandmas Do Best/What Grandpas Do Best is sure to appeal to any child who has or wishes for a brother or sister to play with.

From acclaimed poet Jack Prelutsky and illustrator Yossi Abolafia, My Parents Think I'm Sleeping is the perfect book to get young readers excited about bedtime.This Level 3 I Can Read book is a funny collection of poems about a boy who should be sleeping, but manages to find more than just storybooks and his model rocket kit to keep him awake.From reading under the covers to watching shadows dance on the wall, these fourteen charming verses show that a child's life begins at bedtime!

From the author and illustrator of Peek-a-Who?, Ready, Set, Go!, and Grow Up! (with combined sales of nearly 300,000 copies) comes another irresistible board book. With peek-a-boo windows and a mirror, this engaging booklets youngsters see themselves as adorable animal characters. The mirror is sure to grab and hold toddlers' attention, and the vibrant colors and playful text will capture their imagination.

日本亞瑪遜讀者4.5顆星推薦！由知名設計雜誌MdN的出版社專業編輯--ROCK AND STREETCULTURE 505

喜好搖滾風格以及街頭藝術風格設計者有福了！本書收505種搖滾及街頭風格的圖樣，內容包含哥德風演變而來的骷髏、昆蟲、動物等圖案。另外街頭風格則另外含有沙灘、街頭塗鴉及融合POP風格的圖案。並且附上適用Illustrator的EPS和JPEG檔案，讓您能夠輕鬆地運用特異風格的圖樣，自由變換顏色和架構！

【96年9月好讀推薦】繼大受好評的《日本的紋樣》之後，推出系列作第二集，除了收錄需求較大的中國傳統圖樣——龍、鳳凰、牡丹、雷電等，還有少見的爪哇地區棉布印花。書中說明了各種圖樣的誕生年代及應用之處，可作為今日利用的參考。附件光碟裡的檔案分別有AI、EPS、JPG、PNG格式可供使用。■推薦理由：附有紋樣出處、背景說明的素材光碟。 日本亞瑪遜讀者五顆星推薦！ 大受好評的「素材BOOK」系列第二彈，本次主要收集的是中國和亞洲傳統風格的圖案，像是以龍、鳳凰、牡丹、雷紋為主題的變化花紋，另外特別收集更紗圖樣。本書主要是針對從事設計工作的讀者，因此還提供CD-ROM，內含對應Illustrator8.0以上的EPS檔、JPEG及PNG格式檔案，將這些精選的圖案以最基本的元素呈現出來，方面設計者作色彩的變化甚至於圖案的整合。 CD-ROM對應條件： ・Mac OS:Mac OS 9-Mac OS X v10.2以上 ・Windows:Windows XP、Windows 2000以上
【95年9月好讀推薦】單一輪廓的構成，沒有複雜細部描繪的剪影，是最能強烈傳達圖象意義的象徵性符號。本書收錄栩栩如生的動植物、人物以及車、飛機、樂器、學校等十六個類目，七七五個圖象剪影，隨書附贈光碟，使用者可以免除侵犯著作權的疑慮，自由安全地使用，圖檔線條以illustrator 繪製而成，是設計者使用上十分便利且不可或缺的剪影素材集。

不要把手指放進果凍裡！否則…Nelly！跟你說了！不要戳果凍！噢～結果你還是把手指放進去了！好吧！就讓我來告訴你，為什麼不能把手指放進果凍裡。不能把手指放進果凍，是因為你可能會讓大象不開心。也別把手指放進去派裡，除非你想惹怒大猩猩。讓你戳戳起司上的洞洞？不要吧！萬一被鱷魚咬個正著怎麼辦？經典的洞洞書，搭配鬼才繪本作家Nick Sharratt獨特的幽默感，孩子把手指放進書洞後會發生什麼事？啟發好奇心的童趣設計，以押韻與同音字的設計，搭配圖像互動，親子共讀肯定樂趣無窮。A great reissuing of a classic children's die-cut picture book to tie in with Nick Sharratt's position as official illustrator for World Book Day 2006. Don't put your finger in the jelly, Nelly. You might upset a jellyphant! With a larger format and the best covers yet, this reissue will ensure the continuing longevity of JELLY, NELLY.
Using simple words and bright illustrations, author-illustrator Taro Gomi shows children that sometimes knowledge can come from all kinds of friends.

From the author and illustrator of the best-selling Peek-a-Who? comes another irresistible board book that's sure to entertain curious babies and toddlers. With peek-a-boo windows featuring adorable baby animals, bright colors and a simple, playful text, Grow Up! takes guessing games for toddlers to a new level! Honors for Grow Up!: 2004 CCBC (Cooperative Children's Book Center) Choices selectionFrom the author and illustrator of the best-selling Peek-a-Who? comes another irresistible board book that's sure to entertain curious babies and toddlers. With peek-a-boo windows featuring adorable baby animals, bright colors and a simple, playful text, Grow Up! takes guessing games for toddlers to a new level!Honors for Grow Up!: 2004 CCBC (Cooperative Children's Book Center) Choices selection

The satirical and the surreal genius who has created an unmistakable world of the imagination. Jean-Jacques Sempe, whose books receive instant classic status in France, is an artist known and loved worldwide, with more than twenty collections of drawings published in over thirty countries. He has created the most immediately recognizable style of any illustrator since James Thurber. It is his genius for sweeping satirical observation that has won him such a tremendous following in America. Like every great artist, Sempe has created a world above and beyond specific cultural and political references, a world all his own, one populated by long-faced, aquiline-nosed depressives - psychoanalysts, housewives, and concert pianists. Mother rabbits explain divorce, dogs groove to Walkmans, old women nag their Higher Power about money, and any reader who falls into this hilarious and all-too-familiar world finds it hard to leave.

Icon對於經常使用電腦的讀者而言，可以說是再熟悉也不過了。小小的圖示表示了電腦的各項功能，而這些圖示也成為未來數位時代不可或缺的影像溝通模式。因應未來使用圖示的日趨頻繁與複雜，相關的書籍也相繼出版。

《Icon Mania》就是一本全面以圖示為主題的書籍，從設計圖示時的點子發想、利用現成字型簡單製作3D圖示、抽象概念圖形的成形、明信片的設計、日常生活與辦公室的圖示設計。《Icon Mania》介紹以Photoshop、Illustrator繪圖軟體製作各種圖示的方法及相關技巧，之後以大量的網路設計當範例為讀者說明圖示設計的思考邏輯與參考，最後訪問幾位圖示設計專家的設計想法與圖示構成，書中超過九百個相關作品，全都收錄隨附光碟當中，方便讀者參考使用。

A new, lavishly illustrated oracle deck from bestselling author Katie Daisy!Awaken your sense of wonder with this deck from beloved illustrator Katie Daisy, author of the New York Times bestselling book How To Be a Wildflower. Each of the 78 cards has a symbol on one side and an inspirational phrase on the other. Bursting with florals, fruits, and wildlife, the How To Be a Wildflower Deck will provide you with insight on everything from savoring the moment to believing in yourself. Much like an oracle deck, these cards foster self-reflection and encourage moments of mindful contemplation. Choose the image that calls out to you, or let the universe choose for you―whichever card you select will guide you throughout the day.• BELOVED AUTHOR: New York Times bestselling author Katie Daisy has more than 100K followers on Instagram, where you will find frequent posts featuring her vibrant artwork.• THOUGHTFUL GIFT: The How To Be a Wildflower Deck makes a beautiful gift for the people in your life who look to art and illustration for creative encouragement, self-exploration, and mindfulness.• A CELEBRATION OF NATURE: Nature-lovers and plant-appreciators will find much to admire in this deck. Illustrating everything from shooting stars to sun-ripened strawberries, Katie Daisy has a knack for capturing the very best this magical world has to offer.Perfect for:• Katie Daisy's many fans and followers• Free spirits and nature lovers• Modern mystics and moon worshippers

Water is always flowing, from a brook to a stream, to a river to the ocean. Read and find out more about how water shapes the earth and why it is important to keep our water clean in this fascinating book from author-illustrator Arthur Dorros. This book clearly explains terms like "brook," "stream," "river," and "delta," and the full-color illustrations show where water comes from, how it travels, and where it goes.This is a Stage 2 Let's-Read-and-Find-Out, which means the book explores more challenging concepts for children in the primary grades. Let's-Read-And-Find-Out is the winner of the American Association for the Advancement of Science/Subaru Science Books & Films Prize for Outstanding Science Series.Supports the Common Core Learning Standards and Next Generation Science Standards
Using simple words and bright illustrations, author-illustrator Taro Gomi takes children on a playful tour of the four seasons.
本書主要是介紹Adobe Illustrator 的應用範例，包括海報、DM、CD封面、夾克及T恤圖案、小冊子、卡片等。

This 4th book in our background illustration series is a collection of dark, mysterious and strange illustrations. Fantastical and magical scenery, desolate landscapes, and weird creatures, this book collects 111 dark fantasy artworks from 30 illustrators, including renowned illustrators like Posuka Demizu, the illustrator for the bestselling manga series “The Promised Neverland”, and YoShimizu, the cover illustrator for the 2nd book in the series “Beautiful Scenes from a Fantasy World” (9784756249661). The cover Illustration was drawn by Monokubo（twitter: @13033303）, who, with 200K followers on Twitter, is also getting attention in the Japanese illustration industry. This will be the perfect reference book not just for fantasy art fans but also for illustrators and designers working in the gaming industry.

繪圖其實沒那麼困難。如果不要求完美，它會變得更加簡單容易得多。為了幫助讀者，Flow製作了這本Big Book of Drawing，充滿了教程和繪圖課程，因為學習繪畫的最佳方式是模仿和看看別人做些什麼。最有趣的部分是來自世界各地的Flow illustrator的“如何”課程。可愛、開朗、才華橫溢的讀者，歡迎進入他們的工作室，分享他們的繪畫秘密。還有很多附帶的材料可以使用：描圖紙、迷你素描本、水彩紙、牛皮紙讓你發揮創作本事。
